description: An example of MosAiX deployment architecture.

infrastructureNodes.description: Routes API requests to backend services and supports A/B testing.
infrastructureNodes.name: API Gateway

people.description: A user who interacts with the GPT Assistant to write Architecture as Code using an IDE.
people.name: Cloud Architect/Engineer

components.description: Provides the graphical user interface for user interactions.
components.name: UI

relationships.description: Displays system health and performance metrics

components.description: Handles API requests for user interactions.
components.name: API Input

components.description: Displays system health, performance metrics, and alerts.
components.name: Monitoring Dashboard

components.description: Manages system configurations, settings, and access controls.
components.name: Configuration Management

containers.description: Provides a user-friendly interface for monitoring, configuration management, and API interactions.
containers.name: Input Interface

components.description: Handles incoming requests from the Input Interface.
components.name: Request Handler

components.description: Connects to the underlying large language model (GPT-4o) to process and generate responses.
components.name: LLM Interface AGPT

relationships.description: Uses generated responses to create architectures

components.description: Generates cloud architecture designs based on user requirements.
components.name: Architecture Generator

components.description: Manages user sessions and state across interactions.
components.name: Session Manager

containers.description: An AI assistant that helps users design and optimize their cloud architecture.
containers.name: Architect GPT Assistant

components.description: Processes the DSL input to extract defined elements and their metadata.
components.name: DSL Processor

components.description: Extracts metadata from the DSL for further processing.
components.name: Metadata Extractor

components.description: Converts the processed DSL and metadata into a structured JSON format.
components.name: JSON Transformer

components.description: Connects to the underlying large language model to assist in parsing and transforming DSL to JSON.
components.name: LLM Interface Parser

components.description: Handles API requests and responses.
components.name: API Handler Parser

components.description: Handles streaming data inputs for real-time processing.
components.name: Real-time Data Ingestion

components.description: Integrates feedback from deployment outcomes back into the parsing process.
components.name: Feedback Loop Integrator

components.description: Analyzes context from historical data to improve parsing accuracy.
components.name: Contextual Analyzer

containers.description: Processes DSL inputs and transforms them into a structured JSON format, with enhanced AI capabilities for real-time processing and adaptive parsing.
containers.name: AI-Based Model Parser

components.description: Decomposes the JSON received from the Model Parser into individual elements.
components.name: JSON Decomposer

components.description: Dynamically matches JSON elements to templates using real-time data.
components.name: Dynamic Template Matcher

components.description: Matches decomposed elements to appropriate Infrastructure as Code (IaC) templates from the repository.
components.name: Template Matcher

components.description: Merges multiple IaC templates into a cohesive deployment pattern.
components.name: Pattern Merger

components.description: Generates new IaC patterns autonomously based on identified issues.
components.name: Autonomous Pattern Generator

components.description: Implements self-healing capabilities to automatically correct deployment issues.
components.name: Self-healing Module Mapping

components.description: Connects to the underlying large language model to assist in mapping and merging processes.
components.name: LLM Interface Mapping

components.description: Handles API requests and responses.
components.name: API Handler Mapping

containers.description: Processes JSON inputs to decompose, match, and merge templates into deployable IaC with dynamic and autonomous capabilities.
containers.name: AI-Based Mapping Engine

components.description: Manages version control and tracking of templates.
components.name: Template Version Control

components.description: Handles review and approval of updated templates before merging.
components.name: Template Review System

components.description: Tracks deployments of template versions across the organization.
components.name: Deployment Tracking

containers.description: Stores architecture, infrastructure, configuration, and security code templates for various cloud patterns.
containers.name: Code Template Repository

softwareSystems.description: A revolutionary platform for cloud management powered by advanced LLMs, managing multiple cloud vendors agnostically.
softwareSystems.name: MosAiX
